snippet: A roadside bomb killed at least 9 civilians and wounded at least 20 people on a bus on Monday in the Sayad Abad district of Wardak Province, said Fazal Karim Muslim, the district governor.
abstract: Roadside bomb kills at least nine civilians on public bus in Wardak Province, Afghanistan.
lead_paragraph: A roadside bomb killed at least 9 civilians and wounded at least 20 people on a bus on Monday in the Sayad Abad district of Wardak Province, said Fazal Karim Muslim, the district governor.
